item.description:
Anyone interested in going to see this 16-year-old whiz kid singer-songwriter? She's opening for Manchester Community Music School at 7:00. It's a free open-air venue.

Check out the article in the Hippo:
http://hippopress.com/read-article/young-and-rich-in-talent

I'll put a meetup sign on the back of my chair and try to get a central spot close to the stage.

(Robert, if you go, want to bring one of your red balloons?)

(Cross posted in Adventures & Events)
item.name: MB Padfield at Veteran's Park
